metadata.name: Uncommon Child Process Of Defaultpack.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects uncommon child processes of "DefaultPack.EXE" binary as a proxy to launch other programs

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\defaultpack.exe')))

output.summary: Detects uncommon child processes of "DefaultPack.EXE" binary as a proxy to launch other programs
